alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 22 at 1:36PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SIMPSON AND NORTHERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 136 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Harrisville to Wanilla, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mendenhall, Pinola, Union, Oma, Shivers, Sontag, Wanilla and New Hebron. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and south central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
